openrouterTranslate.apiKey.markdownDescription: OpenRouter API key for authentication. [Get your API key here](https://openrouter.ai/settings/keys)

openrouterTranslate.model.markdownDescription: AI model to use for translation. [Browse all available models](https://openrouter.ai/models?fmt=table)

openrouterTranslate.api.description: OpenRouter API endpoint URL. Usually no need to change this.

openrouterTranslate.prompts.system.markdownDescription: System prompt for AI translation. Variables: `{{to}}` (target language), `{{content}}` (text to translate). [View variable documentation](https://github.com/pzehrel/vscode-comment-translate-openrouter)

openrouterTranslate.prompts.translate.markdownDescription: User prompt for translation requests. Variables: `{{to}}` (target language), `{{content}}` (text to translate). [View variable documentation](https://github.com/pzehrel/vscode-comment-translate-openrouter)

openrouterTranslate.timeout.description: Request timeout in milliseconds (10 minutes by default).

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
